questions.question: what are dreams?

choices.answer: a terrifying or very unpleasant experience
stories and images that our minds create while we sleep
sensations in your brain while sleeping

Does everyone dream?

choices.answer: You're love life is melting into disaster

questions.question: According to Sigmund Freud, "The Interpretation of Dreams", he believes that dream containing:
How do you interpret your dream?

choices.answer: Keep eye close and replay entire dream
Write a description of your dream
Wake up and go to sleep again
Two of the answers are right

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the part of the mind most involved in dreaming?
Which of the following is true about remembering dream?

choices.answer: If you don't remember your dream now, you never will
If your dream is not important, you won't remember it
you can improve your ability to remember your dream
You remember your dream if you go to bed late

questions.question: To recall your dream most clearly, when is the best time to write your dream down?

choices.answer: Just before you go to bed the next night
When you first wake up from the dream

questions.question: Which is of the following is not help you remember your dreams?

choices.answer: Review your dream from the night before
Relax first thing in the morning
Eat a nice, big meal before going to bed
Remind yourself to remember your dream before bed time

questions.question: What does it mean when you see you get stuck in a ditch while riding a bike in your dream?

choices.answer: You feel off track somehow in your life
You like to ride your bike

questions.question: You dream your girlfriend gives you a winning lottery ticket, this probably means:

choices.answer: You think your girlfriend buy to many lottery tickets
You're going to win the lottery
You feel lucky to have this girlfriend

questions.question: Dreams are useful for learning more about your:
Interpreting dreams can help you:

choices.answer: Learn how you really feel about something

questions.question: Which is true about dream interpretation?

choices.answer: You either can interpret dreams or you can't
Most dreams are too mysterious to really understand
Most dreams don't have any value to dreamer
You can improve your ability to interpret dreams

questions.question: Most accurate way to interpret your dream is to:

choices.answer: Just guess what it means yourself
Interpret it yourself with the help of dream expert
Ask a friend or parent what it means
Look up a symbol in a dream dictionary

questions.question: Which of the actions can help improve your dream recall:

choices.answer: Talking with a friend about your dream often
Thinking about the dream you've already had
Recording your dreams in a dream journal

questions.question: You dream you're being chased by a swarm of angry bee. What does it mean?

choices.answer: You have too much on your mind
You hate wearing yellow and black together
You're hungry for honey or something sweet
You've been spending too much money
